{{infobox character | people=[[Elves|Elf]] | image=Juliana Pinho - Angrod's Family.png | caption="Angrod's Family" (Eldalótë on the right) by [[:Category:Images by Juliana Pinho|Juliana Pinho]] | name=Eldalótë | pronun=[[Quenya|Q]], {{IPA|[ˌeldaˈloːte]}} | othernames=''Eðellos'' ([[Sindarin|S]]) | titles= | position= | location= | affiliation= | language= | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse=[[Angrod]] | children=[[Orodreth]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Eldalótë''' was the wife of [[Angrod]]. Their son was [[Orodreth]], a [[lord of Nargothrond]].{{PM|XI4}}, p. 346 She probably joined the [[Exile of the Noldor]], as her name was translated into Sindarin in later legend, but she is not mentioned in any of the tales of [[Beleriand]].This can be assumed by considering a note that [[Finarfin]] was "the only name of a Ñoldo who did not come into exile to receive a Sindarin form"; therefore as Eldalótë also had a Sindarin name, she was one of the Exiles. Cf. {{PM|XINotes}}, p. 360, note 31 == Etymology == ''Eldalótë'' is [[Quenya]] for "Elven-flower", from ''[[Elda]]'' ("Elf") + ''[[lótë]]'' ("flower"). The [[Sindarin]] form of her name was '''''Eðellos''''' (spelled ''Edhellos'').{{PM|XI4}}, p. 346 == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree| | | | | FIN |y| IND | | | | | | | | | OLW | | | | | | | |FIN=[[Finwë]]
